name: DockerComposeDeploy
description: Uses docker compose to deploy containers
author: Bailey Everts

inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Compose Direcotry
inputs.helpMarkDown: Directory where compose file is located

inputs.name: name
inputs.label: Machine Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: If host the target host exists in machine use its name here (Alternatively set the host below)

inputs.name: swarm
inputs.label: Swarm
inputs.helpMarkDown: If target is a swarm cluster set this to true (this param only matters if using `Machine Name`)

inputs.name: host
inputs.label: Target Host
inputs.helpMarkDown: If not using machine name set the host ip and port that the docker daemon is listening on (if name is set this value will be ignored)
